alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 1:17AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN PUSHMATAHA... SOUTHWESTERN LATIMER...SOUTHWESTERN LE FLORE AND SOUTHEASTERN PITTSBURG COUNTIES THROUGH 215 AM CDT... At 117 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles north of Higgins to 7 miles south of Hartshorne to 8 miles south of Kiowa. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Talihina... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Higgins... Damon... Snow... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Stanley... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Whitesboro... Dunbar... Eubanks... Gowen... Sardis... Finley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for southeastern Oklahoma.
